wdi2-SL.FAM.0714.MA.ZS.def: Unpaid family workers are people who work without pay in a market-oriented establishment operated by a related person living in the same household.
wdi2-SL.FAM.0714.MA.ZS.name: Children in employment, unpaid family workers
wdi2-SL.FAM.0714.MA.ZS.source: Understanding Children's Work project based on data from ILO, UNICEF and the World Bank.
wdi2-SL.FAM.0714.MA.ZS.dataset: Understanding Children's Work project based on data from ILO, UNICEF and the World Bank.
wdi2-SL.FAM.0714.MA.ZS.units: % of male children in employment, ages 7-14
